goalTracker.title: Weekly Goal Progress Tracker
goalTracker.description: Learners with goals are 75% more likely to complete courses. Set your weekly goal now to take charge of your learning journey and drive your success!
goalTracker.commitment: I commit to learning {{days}} days each week on MTLS
goalTracker.selectDays: Select the days you want to learn. You can always change this later.

assignment.needsImprovement: You need at least 70% to complete this exercise.
